#!/bin/bash
# Rename all .ts files in archive to .ts.archived to prevent TypeScript from seeing them

echo "Renaming TypeScript files in archive to prevent compilation..."
echo "============================================================="

find archive -name "*.ts" -type f | while read file; do
    new_name="${file}.archived"
    echo "Renaming: $file -> $new_name"
    mv "$file" "$new_name"
done

echo ""
echo "Done! All .ts files in archive have been renamed to .ts.archived"

    Write-Host "Renaming: $($_.FullName) -> $newName" -ForegroundColor Cyan

}
